name: WP SpaceContent
author: KokoenDE

sections.description:
Control your Space Content account directly from your WordPress Dashboard.

Just fill in the ID of your web and you will see all the data in your Dashboard!

Arbitrary section

Space Content is a german startup which provides a 22nd century marketing platform.

Through cross-channel publicity and branded content generation, we transform the way brands approach customers. Our one-stop-shop solution for advertisers and publishers invites them to join the world of innovative marketing.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/wp-spacecontent directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->WP-SpaceContent screen to configure the plugin
  4. Add a widget where you want the ads to be show, and indicate the ID of the place
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/wp-spacecontent directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->WP-SpaceContent screen to configure the plugin
  4. Add a widget where you want the ads to be show, and indicate the ID of the place

Do I have to register on spacecontent.net first?

Yes, you do have to be a registered user of spacecontent.net! But don’t worry, you can easily register your blog here: https://spacecontent.net/users/register/?account=pub and join Space Content as Publisher!
